    • 方法详细资料

      • connect

        public boolean connect(java.lang.String addr)
        Connect to the remote device.

        This is an asynchronous operation. Once the operation has been completed, the TransportLayerCallback.onConnectionStateChange(boolean, boolean) callback is invoked, reporting the result of the operation.

        返回:
        the operation result

      • close

        public void close()
        Close, it will disconnect to the remote.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect, it will disconnect to the remote.

      • setDeviceName

        public void setDeviceName(java.lang.String name)
        Set the name
        参数:
        name - the name

      • getDeviceName

        public void getDeviceName()
        Get the name

      • receiveData

        public void receiveData(byte[] data)
        When the Low Layer receive a packet, it will call this method
        参数:
        data - the receive data

      • sendData

        public boolean sendData(byte[] data)
        Send Data packet to the remote. Up stack can use this method to send data. If last packet didn't send ok, didn't allow send next packet.
        参数:
        data - the send data

      • stopRxSchedule
